data.name: Mysterious Night (The First Night)
data.detailed_description:
The First Night


About the Game

Mystic Night (the first night) is a story about a boy named Uri and the mysteries surrounding him. Learn and explore with this Uri boy.
Nothing would have happened if his curiosity hadn't been awakened.
The story revolves around the boy Uri, he is a very curious person about mysteries, where he is living suddenly one day the mysteries gradually appear, a little girl has mysteriously disappeared. .
When his neighbors are talking, Uri is curious and begins to investigate, every clue he finds leads him to an abandoned house.
When he learned that the girl who was missing because of fear had died in this abandoned house, he could not help but faint, but when he woke up, he was in the grounds of that abandoned house.

key features

  • Wild scenery, damp house. The sounds of animals and insects.
  • The game brings a bit of fear, accompanied by mysterious curiosity, by finding objects to help the girl rest in peace.
  • Next is the unfinished house, everything in the house is incomplete, find and open the door scenes to exit the house,
  • The necessary items to help you get out of here.
  • You will not have to worry about lack of light when equipped with a flashlight
  • You can also go faster while holding the shortcut
  • Let's experience it together

data.short_description: Puzzle and mystery genre, find objects to escape. The game evokes exploration and discovery of mysteries with a hint of gloom and curiosity. Mystic Night (first night) is a story about a boy named Uri and the mysteries surrounding him.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 4 Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 620
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: KeyBoard and Mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 8 Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: KeyBoard and Mouse
